Package com.simplify.android.sdk.api

Interface Summary
ErrorHandling All listener interfaces must extend ErrorHandling to provide feedback when asynchronous calls to the Simplify.com API fail in some way.
 

Class Summary
ApiConstants  
AsyncApiRequest<I,V,L extends ErrorHandling> Basis for making an asynchronous calls to the Simplify.com API.
UrlBuilder From a base URL, add path segments and parameters to build up a full URL.
